DOC.brief_summary: The objective study ass compare preliminary efficacy , safety tolerability fispemifene 300 mg placebo give daily 8 week treatment hypogonadal men erectile dysfunction ( ED ) unresponsive PDE5 inhibitor .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Evaluating Fispemifene Treatment Hypogonadal Men With Erectile Dysfunction Unresponsive PDE5 Inhibitors
DOC.criteria: Hypogonadal ( morning total testosterone level ≤400 ng/dl ) men age ≥20 ED unresponsive PDE5 inhibitor , demonstrate International Index Erectile Function ( IIEF ) result 28day lead period .
